bibl.title: Mestra at Athens: Hesiod fr. 43 and the Poetics of Panhellenism.
The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions
bibl.author: RUTHERFORD, Ian

bibl.note: Introduction: Panhellenic poetics. - Blighted progeny. The story of Sisyphus and the Ehoie of Mestra. - The Mestra-Ehoie. A reading. - Erysichthon and Athens. - The Catalogue and Athens.
RUTHERFORD Ian, Mestra at Athens: Hesiod fr. 43 and the Poetics of Panhellenism.
Richard HUNTER (Ed.), The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions (Cambridge, 2005) pp. 99-117.
